name: Pixar Academy
description: Pixar Animation Studios, commonly known as simply Pixar, is an American computer animation studio known for its critically and commercially successful computer animated feature films.

name: Disney Academy
address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521
description: The Walt Disney Company, commonly known as Disney, is an American multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate headquartered at the Walt Disney Studios complex in Burbank, California.
